page.title: 18FARM MACHINERY
page.content: Machinery found on an arable farm. This farmer has eight tractors. These are used with the following attach- ments: a trailer for transporting anything around the farm and a hedge trimmer. The tractor pulls the implements necessary for growing crops; like the plough, the roller, discs, drill and cultivator. There is a gang mower and a smaller mower and a loader. At harvest time a combine harvester is used, an elevator and a baler. On a dairy farm there is a milking parlour with milking machines. The milk goes into the bulk tank for collection by the milk tanker. There are six tractors with the following attachments: a corn crusher(mill), 3 trailers, a winch, a loader, an elevator, a crawler, a dung spreader, a sledge, a digger, and a baler.
